languages.text: Неразведанные системы, освещаемые безымянными звездами — сюда привела Вольного Торговца погоня за Лорд-инквизитором. Здесь все решится.
Unexplored systems lit by nameless stars — this is where the Rogue Trader's pursuit of the Lord Inquisitor has led {mf|him|her}. This is where everything will be decided.
languages.original_text: Неразведанные системы, освещаемые безымянными звездами — сюда привела Вольного Торговца погоня за Лорд-инквизитором. Здесь все решится.

traits.locale_text: Unexplored systems lit by nameless stars — this is where the Rogue Trader's chase for the Lord Inquisitor has led {mf|him|her}. This is where everything will be decided.
Unexplored systems lit by nameless stars — this is where the Rogue Trader's chase for the Lord Inquisitor has led {mf|him|her}. This is where everything will be decided.
Unexplored systems lit by nameless stars — this is where the Rogue Trader's pursuit of the Lord Inquisitor has led {mf|him|her}. This is where everything will be decided.
Unexplored systems lit by nameless stars — this is where the Rogue Trader's pursuit of the Lord Inquisitor has led {mf|him|her}. This is where everything will be decided.

languages.text: Des systèmes inexplorés éclairés par des étoiles sans nom : c'est là que se retrouve {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dans sa poursuite du seigneur inquisiteur. C'est aussi là que tout se jouera.
languages.original_text: Unexplored systems lit by nameless stars — this is where the Rogue Trader's pursuit of the Lord Inquisitor has led {mf|him|her}. This is where everything will be decided.

traits.locale_text: Des systèmes inexplorés éclairés par des étoiles sans nom : c'est là que se retrouve {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dans sa poursuite du seigneur inquisiteur. C'est aussi là que tout se jouera.

languages.text: 未知的星系被无名群星的光芒照亮。这就是行商浪人一路寻找大审判官来到的地方，也是决定一切最终命运的地方。
languages.original_text: Unexplored systems lit by nameless stars — this is where the Rogue Trader's pursuit of the Lord Inquisitor has led {mf|him|her}. This is where everything will be decided.

traits.locale_text: 未知的星系被无名群星的光芒照亮。这就是行商浪人一路寻找审判长来到的地方，也是决定一切最终命运的地方。

languages.text: 名もなき星々に照らされた未踏の星系。この場所こそが、自由開拓者がロード・インクィジターを追いかけた末にたどり着いた場所だ。すべての決着がつく場所にもなるだろう。
languages.original_text: Unexplored systems lit by nameless stars — this is where the Rogue Trader's pursuit of the Lord Inquisitor has led {mf|him|her}. This is where everything will be decided.

traits.locale_text: 名もなき星々に照らされた未踏の星系。この場所こそが、自由開拓者がロード・インクィジターを追いかけた末にたどり着いた場所だ。すべての決着がつく場所にもなるだろう。

languages.text: Unerforschte Systeme, die von namenlosen Sternen erhellt werden — dorthin hat {mf|seine Jagd nach dem Großinquisitor den Freihändler|ihre Jagd nach dem Großinquisitor die Freihändlerin} geführt. Dort muss alles entschieden werden.
languages.original_text: Unexplored systems lit by nameless stars — this is where the Rogue Trader's pursuit of the Lord Inquisitor has led {mf|him|her}. This is where everything will be decided.

traits.locale_text: Unerforschte Systeme, die von namenlosen Sternen erhellt werden — dorthin hat {mf|seine Jagd nach dem Großinquisitor den Freihändler|ihre Jagd nach dem Großinquisitor die Freihändlerin} geführt. Dort muss alles entschieden werden.

languages.text: Sistemas inexplorados iluminados por estrellas sin nombre: ahí es donde la búsqueda del Lord Inquisidor ha llevado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Aquí se decidirá todo.
languages.original_text: Unexplored systems lit by nameless stars — this is where the Rogue Trader's pursuit of the Lord Inquisitor has led {mf|him|her}. This is where everything will be decided.

traits.locale_text: Sistemas inexplorados iluminados por estrellas sin nombre: ahí es donde la búsqueda del Lord Inquisidor ha llevado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Aquí se decidirá todo.

languages.text: Meçhul yıldızlarla aydınlanan keşfedilmemiş sistemler... Hür Tacir'in Lord Engizisyoncu'yu ararken yolu buraya düştü. Her şey burada karara bağlanacak.
languages.original_text: Unexplored systems lit by nameless stars — this is where the Rogue Trader's pursuit of the Lord Inquisitor has led {mf|him|her}. This is where everything will be decided.
